com.htsmart.wristband.connector

接口 ConnectorListener


  • public interface ConnectorListener
    Wristband connection state callback.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int FAILED_BIND
      Bind user failed
      static int FAILED_CONNECT_ERROR
      Connect failed
      static int FAILED_GET_CONFIG
      Get wristband config failed
      static int FAILED_ILLEGAL_DEVICE
      Illegal device.
      static int FAILED_LOGIN
      Login user failed
      static int FAILED_SERVICES_ERROR
      Discovery service failed
      static int FAILED_UNSTABLE_ERROR
      Bluetooth stack instability

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onConnect(WristbandConfig config, boolean isLogin)
      Connect successfully.
      void onConnectFailed(int failedCode)
      Connect failed.
      void onDisconnect(boolean isCloseActive, boolean reconnect)
      Disconnected.

    • 字段详细资料

      • FAILED_UNSTABLE_ERROR

        static final int FAILED_UNSTABLE_ERROR
        Bluetooth stack instability
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FAILED_CONNECT_ERROR

        static final int FAILED_CONNECT_ERROR
        Connect failed
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FAILED_SERVICES_ERROR

        static final int FAILED_SERVICES_ERROR
        Discovery service failed
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FAILED_ILLEGAL_DEVICE

        static final int FAILED_ILLEGAL_DEVICE
        Illegal device. When the Bluetooth connection is successful, the matching service and the characteristic are failed, or the Notify fails to open, which is considered an illegal device.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FAILED_BIND

        static final int FAILED_BIND
        Bind user failed
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FAILED_LOGIN

        static final int FAILED_LOGIN
        Login user failed
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FAILED_GET_CONFIG

        static final int FAILED_GET_CONFIG
        Get wristband config failed
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • onConnect

        void onConnect(WristbandConfig config,
             boolean isLogin)
        Connect successfully.
        参数:
        config - Wristband all config.
        isLogin - connect type is login or bind. True for login ,false for bind.

      • onDisconnect

        void onDisconnect(boolean isCloseActive,
                boolean reconnect)
        Disconnected.
        参数:
        isCloseActive - True for active disconnect, false for passive disconnect.
        reconnect - Whether the internal is re connected. This value is only valid when isCloseActive==false.

      • onConnectFailed

        void onConnectFailed(int failedCode)
        Connect failed.
        参数:
        failedCode - Failed reason.The reasons for failure are divided into two types: Bluetooth error and logical error.

        Bluetooth error.When the connection fails, it will continue to try to connect. If you do not need to continue to re connect, you need call IDeviceConnector.close(). FAILED_UNSTABLE_ERROR FAILED_CONNECT_ERROR FAILED_SERVICES_ERROR

        Logical error.When the connection fails, will not continue to try to connect. FAILED_BIND FAILED_LOGIN FAILED_GET_CONFIG
